revised_title: Magnetic Disturbances in Northamptonshire and Leicestershire and their Relations to Geological Structure
tldr: This study investigates magnetic disturbances in Northamptonshire and Leicestershire, examining their relationship to the geological structure and iron ore deposits. The research involved a detailed magnetic survey, geological examination, and testing of rock magnetic susceptibilities to determine the origin of the disturbances and their connection to iron-ore deposits.
